ComicInfo.Title: A Date With Hopey; Space Case; Those Wild and Mixed Up Locas; A Little Story...; Hey Hopey; The Many Faces of "Big" Danny Chesterfield; The Adventures of Maggie the Mechanic; Sugar 'N' Spikes; The Goat; Meanwhile, Back at the Ranch...; 24T; Chelo's Burden; Mecanicos
ComicInfo.Summary:
Henry recounts his relationship with Maggie and Hopey, and his attempts to start a romance with the latter.
Guadalupe tries to find out if the sky goes on forever.
Rand takes Maggie out to a restaurant in an effort to patch up their loose ends. Unfortunately, Maggie's insecurities get in the way.
The kids don't want to play with Satch after he threatens to tell the adults that the kids are going to the watering hole.
Siblings Hopey and Joey talk about their mother and Maggie.
Danny goes to a peep show and interrupts the proceedings.
Maggie and Rand try to rescue Duke from inside a fallen robot.
Vicente recounts what happened when he got into a kicking contest with Pipo.
The narrator recounts what happened in a bar when she saw a person she hadn't seen since junior high.
The girls have a conversation about Maggie.
Penny starts an argument with Costigan in a restaurant.
The narrator gives a rundown on various residents of Palomar.
Maggie's first day as Rand's assistant doesn't turn out as planned.
The narrator asks the girls their feelings on being inside a color comic book for the first time.
